import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import Presentation from './Presentation'; import Footer from './Footer'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import {Row,Col,Container} from 'react-bootstrap' import Aos from 'aos'; import detail from '../images/detail.png' import Caracteristique from '../images/caracteristique.png' import option from '../images/option.png' import WhatsAppWidget from 'react-whatsapp-widget' import 'react-whatsapp-widget/dist/index.css' const VoitureLuxeDetail = () => { const {id} = useParams() const [data, setData] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { Aos.init({duration:3000}) getDataById() }, []); const getDataById = async () => { const urlGetDataById = `http://localhost:5000/login/RechercheDetailVoiture/${id}` await axios.get(urlGetDataById).then((res)=> {setData([res.data.detailVoiture])}) } const ContacterDeutsh = () => { return( ) } return (
{console.log(data)}

model: {detailVoiture.model}

puissance: {detailVoiture.puissance}
qualitéVoiture: {detailVoiture.qualitéVoiture}
rapports: {detailVoiture.rapports}

*/}

 ) })}

) })}
); }; export default VoitureLuxeDetail;
